mapper.select: SELECT sl.id, sl.spec_code, sl.`name`, sl.url, sl.show_image, sl.sort, sl.type, sl.time_limit, sl.bind_act_code, wm.oms_code, wm.mall_code, wm.mall_name, wm.province, wm.city, sm.is_show as link_show FROM tb_wap_act_spec_link AS sl, tb_wap_act_mall_spec_merge AS sm, tb_wap_mall as wm WHERE sl.spec_code = sm.spec_code and sm.oms_code = wm.oms_code and sm.act_code = #{actCode} order by wm.province, wm.city, wm.oms_code
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_wap_act_mall_spec_merge ( oms_code, act_code, spec_code, is_show, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{list.omsCode},#{actCode},#{specCode},#{list.linkShow},now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_wap_act_spec_link t SET t.`name` = #{link.name}, t.url = #{link.url}, t.show_image = #{link.showImage}, t.type = #{link.type}, t.time_limit = #{link.timeLimit}, t.bind_act_code = #{link.bindActCode}, t.update_time = NOW( ) WHERE t.spec_code = #{link.specCode}
